metadata.title: CVE-2020-15989 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: Uninitialized data in PDFium in Google Chrome prior to 86.0.4240.75 alloweda remote attacker to obtain potentially sensitive information from processmemory via a crafted PDF file.

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
